headline: Can AES' Battery Storage Leadership Shape Grid Modernization?
summary: AES highlights leadership in battery energy storage, from first utility-scale lithium-ion systems to major solar + storage projects, boosting grid resilience.

headline: RSPU: Utilities Sector Dashboard For January
